column3: Latest;Police made a series of raids targeted suspects who had committed armed robberies and trafficked drugs between 26 May-May 29
column14: 3 vehicles (1 Indian tuk tuk and 2 Honda 125s)
column15: 5 phones and 5 large packets of drugs were seized.------After the arrests
column16: the Criminal Police Department handed over the suspects and the above evidence to the Phnom Penh Municipal Police for further action.
